document_data.caption: A map showing Adder Lane where it met Fishgut Court.
document_data.name: Adder Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Adder Lane''' was minor avenue of hard-packed earth and [[gravel]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This road ran from northwest to southeast, extending off of the [[Fishgut Court]] and terminating at an intersection with [[Gut Alley]]. Not far from its opening at Fishgut Court, the lane was intersected by [[Wastrel Alley]].
